description: Define canonical ticket origin values for this phase: internal, client_portal, inbound_email, api
Add shared TicketOrigin type in @alga-psa/types and include api in the union
Add tickets.ticket_origin persisted column (text) via migration
Backfill existing tickets.ticket_origin using legacy signals (email_metadata, creator user_type, fallback internal)
Keep ticket_origin storage extensible for future values (for example ai_agent) without schema redesign
Internal MSP create path writes ticket_origin=internal
Client portal create path writes ticket_origin=client_portal
Inbound email create path writes ticket_origin=inbound_email
API create path writes ticket_origin=api
Update shared TicketModel validation so ticket_origin is preserved and persisted
Implement shared ticket origin normalization/resolver helper with legacy fallback for null historical rows
MSP getTicketById returns normalized ticket_origin for TicketDetails
Client portal getClientTicketDetails returns normalized ticket_origin for TicketDetails
Add shared TicketOriginBadge component with internal/client_portal/inbound_email/api variants and unknown fallback
Render TicketOriginBadge in MSP TicketDetails header near ticket number and response state badge
Render TicketOriginBadge in client portal TicketDetails header/status area
Add locale keys for ticket origin labels including Created via API
Preserve existing comment response-source badge behavior with no regression
Preserve existing response-state badge behavior with no regression
Add automated tests for persistence, backfill, resolver logic, API distinction, and both TicketDetails surfaces
